examples.title: Basic Job Board
steps: Create a Notion database with columns: Job Title, Company, Location, Salary, Description, Posted Date
Use Super.so to turn your Notion database into a public website
Create a Tally form for employers to submit job listings
Connect Tally submissions to your Notion database via Zapier
Share your job board URL and start promoting to your target audience
notes: Consider upgrading to Airtable for better filtering

examples.title: Freelancer Marketplace
steps: Build an Airtable base with freelancer profiles, skills, rates, and portfolios
Use Softr to create a searchable directory with user authentication
Integrate Stripe for payment processing between clients and freelancers
Set up automated email notifications for new bookings
Launch with 10-20 quality freelancers to build initial traction
notes: Requires more complex setup but scales better

examples.title: Local Business Directory
steps: Create Airtable base with business info: Name, Category, Address, Phone, Website, Description
Use Softr to build a public directory with search and filtering
Integrate Google Maps for location display and directions
Add submission form for businesses to self-register
Monetize through featured listings or premium placements
notes: Google Maps API has usage limits on free tier

examples.title: Professional Network Directory
steps: Build Notion database for professional profiles with expertise, experience, contact info
Use Super.so to create a searchable public directory
Integrate Cal.com booking links for each professional
Create categories and tags for easy filtering (lawyers, doctors, consultants)
Add testimonials and rating system using Notion relations
notes: Works well for niche professional communities

examples.title: Startup Idea Voting Platform
steps: Create Airtable base for startup ideas with fields: Title, Description, Category, Votes, Submitted By
Use Softr to build voting interface with user authentication
Set up Zapier automation to send weekly digest of top ideas
Add categories like 'SaaS', 'E-commerce', 'Social Impact'
Implement leaderboard and badges for top contributors

examples.title: Product Feedback Board
steps: Create Notion database for feature requests with Priority, Status, Votes, User Info
Use Super.so to display public roadmap and completed features
Add Tally form for users to submit new feature requests
Create status workflow: Submitted → Under Review → In Progress → Done
Set up email notifications for status updates
notes: Consider integrating with your development workflow

examples.title: Newsletter with Archives
steps: Set up Ghost blog for newsletter archives and SEO-friendly content
Use ConvertKit for email delivery and subscriber management
Connect Ghost and ConvertKit via Zapier for automatic email sending
Create signup forms and lead magnets to grow subscriber base
Monetize through sponsorships or premium subscriptions

examples.title: Online Course Platform
steps: Create course structure in Notion with modules, lessons, and resources
Use Super.so to build a beautiful course website
Upload video lessons to Loom for easy embedding
Set up Gumroad for payment processing and access control
Create email sequences for student onboarding and engagement
notes: Gumroad handles payments and digital delivery
Loom is free for up to 25 videos

examples.title: Analytics Dashboard
steps: Set up Airtable as your data warehouse with proper schemas
Use Retool to build interactive dashboards and admin panels
Connect external data sources via APIs (Google Analytics, social media)
Create automated reports and email alerts for key metrics
Add user authentication and role-based access control
notes: Great for internal tools and client dashboards

examples.title: Workflow Automation Tool
steps: Design workflow triggers and actions in Airtable
Use Zapier to connect multiple apps and automate processes
Set up webhooks for real-time data synchronization
Add Slack notifications for important workflow events
Create user interface for managing and monitoring workflows

notion.name: Notion
notion.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, databases, and collaboration
notion.pricing: Free for personal, $8/month per user for teams

airtable.name: Airtable
airtable.pricing: Free for basic, $20/month per user for teams

super.name: Super.so
super.description: Turn Notion pages into fast, SEO-friendly websites

softr.name: Softr
softr.description: Build web apps from Airtable data with user authentication

tally.name: Tally
tally.description: Create beautiful forms that feel like documents

zapier.name: Zapier
zapier.description: Connect and automate workflows between 5000+ apps
